      • buildArea

        public void buildArea​(UArea area)
        Description copied from class: ULandscaper
        Construct a complete area, given a blank UArea. Override this and add parameters to be passed in by your UCartographer to determine the character of the area you produce. You must call SetStairsLabels() at the end of this method before you return the area to ensure that area links are properly created.
        Overrides:
        buildArea in class ULandscaper

                           int y,
                           Stairs t)
        Description copied from class: ULandscaper
        Set the label for a Stairs (in the given area) to its proper outgoing area. This should be called by any ULandscaper.makeArea() before returning.
